description:
Change of use of an existing storage depot and ancillary office to a waste transfer station for temporary storage of excavated builders materials and hardcore. 

 APPLICANTS PLAN NOS.:   Existing plans KXTS E1                         Proposed plans KXTS P0001                         Location Plan KX/TS 001/05
decision_conditions:
If Camden Council is minded to approve the scheme it is recommended the following condition(s) be included. 

 (1) That the movement of vehicles to and from the site be monitored for a given period of time to see if there are appreciable variations in traffic flow from that at present, so as to protect the amenity of residents in the neighbouring area.
